name: College of Whispers
description: Bards of this college use their words to sow fear and manipulate, hiding among other entertainers.

3.name: Psychic Blades
3.description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, expend a Bardic Inspiration to deal an extra 2d6 psychic damage, increasing to 3d6 at 5th level, 5d6 at 10th, and 8d6 at 15th.

3.name: Words of Terror
3.description: If you speak to a humanoid alone for at least 1 minute, it must make a Wisdom save or be frightened of you or another creature for 1 hour.

6.name: Mantle of Whispers
6.description: When a humanoid dies within 30 feet, capture its shadow to magically assume its appearance for 1 hour, gaining access to information it would freely share.

14.name: Shadow Lore
14.description: As an action, whisper to one creature within 30 feet, forcing a Wisdom save. On a failure it is charmed for 8 hours, convinced you know its most mortifying secret and obeying your commands.
